name: Govee
0:
”Alexa, ask govee what is the temperature and humidity of bedroom”
”Alexa, ask govee about the temperature of bedroom”
”Alexa, ask govee to tell me the humidity of bedroom”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: govee
Developer Terms of Use
des:
About This skill ：
If you have any problem, please contact our customer service: support@govee.com
To get started, select the “enable” button in the Alexa App to link your Govee Home account. After a few easy setup steps, you can control your device with Alexa.
Once you know the name of your device, you can say the following:
Alexa, ask Govee what’s the temperature of bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee what’s the humidity of the bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee what’s the temperature and humidity of the bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee about the temp and humidity of the bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee for the temperature and humidity of the bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee to give me the temperature and humidity of the bedroom.
Alexa, ask Govee to tell me the temperature and humidity of the bedroom.
